title: STILL Can't listen to DJ Sona's music in game when she's on my team
body: No I don't use curse voice.  Yes I bring up and hold tab.  There is no Icon what so ever next to her portrait in the tab'd scorecard.

replies.body: Can someone provide a screen shot of what it should look like?  Cause yea...there's never anything there anytime I'm in the game with one.
This is where the icon is located. It's not on the scorecard, but on the far left where it shows if your allies' ults are ready.
Can you put this on a bulletin board or something? You have no idea how hard it is to explain this to people who still don't get it...

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=J2vwyQG3,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-02T23:49:19.086+0000)
>
> Done and done!

Thank you ms katey xD

You got it!

Also, [link](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/0AQTKJI1-how-to-opting-in-to-dj-sonas-music) to the post!
Every game I get a DJ Sona on my team the song is always the same despite them saying they changed it. Is this a known bug? Should I repair my client?
That's with you opting in to hearing her music?
Even on the left side next to sona portrait it doesn't show up. Is this a current bug ? the skin is still new so
Yea...that icon never appears for me. :(

Feel like Riot should maybe frontpage the placement of the music icon. Or add it to the DJ Sona page.
It was pretty confusing and seem to not be alone since this keep coming up in forums.
Instructions say to hit TAB then hit music icon by Sona's icon, everyone assuming Sona icon in middle cause that's what pops up when you hit TAB.
Maybe also remove the hit tab part of the process since the Sona icon where you have to click is there even when you don't hit tab. Guess maybe that could lead to a few misclicks? Not likely though since it's off in a corner.

It's not on the scorecard. The icon is next to her portrait on the left side of the screen; the one that has the green ult dot. 

Hope that helps :)

> [{quoted}](name=Vampy3k,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=J2vwyQG3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-02T17:50:36.763+0000)
>
> It's not on the scorecard. The icon is next to her portrait on the left side of the screen; the one that has the green ult dot. 
> 
> Hope that helps :)

Nothing there either.
i cant hear nothing. too i hold the tab button and i make sure the music is up. but still nothing and anyone plz help me {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
